entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • openSUSE Tumbleweed - nothing provides 'libopenssl1_0_0' #113346
  • Officially document and update the `DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE` app property #113344
    Future
  • MemoryCache has a Finalizer #113340
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113338
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg2)' during 'Generate code' #113337
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'use != nullptr' during 'Clone blocks with range checks' #113334
    10.0.0
  • Backporting deadlock fixes in Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents to LTS #113332
  • [9.0] MemoryCacheTest.Trim(String throwOnDisposed=true) failure - assert values differ #113331
  • [infra][iOS][tvOS] Update Apple mobile OS versions used for CI testing to 18.x #113325
    10.0.0
  • System.ThreadPool.GetAvailableThreads always returns maxIoCompletionThreads instead of available IO Completion Threads #113322
  • JIT: Bad result on arm32 #113321
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bad result with modulo on linux-arm64 #113320
    10.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows, Version=4.1.1.0 #113319
  • ARM32 SIMD / NEON instruction set support #113317
  • WebSocket client on Blazor Wasm on .NET 8 does not abort when disposed. #113311
  • Test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_r/Vector256_1_r.cmd #113308

Closed

  • OpenSSL stores refreshing blocks multiple threads causing lock contention and thread pool exhaustion. #113227
    8.0.x
  • [Feature Proposal] AOT universal shared generics #113038
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/Dispatch/Dispatch.cmd #112772
  • [browser] Change default boot.json name #109876
    Future
  • Arm64 SVE: Use mask versions of instructions where possible. #103078
    10.0.0
  • LdapConnection causes an NullReferenceException when authenticating with Authentication type external and a client certificate #113154
    10.0.0
  • Add String.Replace() method overloads to accept String Arrays #40407
  • Array.IndexOf option to use IComparable #40410
  • Is/should there a code-style for avoiding null on left side of a binary expression? #40561
  • Outdated instructions in runtime/pr-guide.md #41068

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't update side-effects in a statement that doesn't exist #113351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging into release/9.0 #113350
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #113349
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • Make sure FEATURE_STANDALONE_GC is defined for the usual VM build #113347
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix missing ServiceCallSite.Key causing an unkeyed cache entry to be overwritten by a keyed instance #113343
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Clear diagnostic headers on request reuse #113342
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [android][coreclr] Fix lifetime of host_runtime_contract in template #113341
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] profiler setup and env variables #113339
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reword HostAbortedException docs #113336
    area-Extensions-Hosting, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `fgReorderBlocks` #113335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113333
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Remove `fgRelocateEHRegions` #113330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113328
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Run switch peeling only once #113326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid dual "parameter" assignments #113324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst

Merged

  • Assertprop: Remove more useless assertions + cleanup #113298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AreVNsEquivalent #113304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some more constant folding in lowering #113301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Back port logical equivalent of #102838 #113230
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Use zero register as argument for atomics #112693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Switch generic instance cache back to GHashTable; improve ginst hash function #113316
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112991
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.4
  • [browser] Add application environment to boot config #113164
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Skip inbuild projects in stage2 (built by stage1) #113243
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Add test that AppContext.BaseDirectory is rooted #113232
    needs-area-label
  • Publish all assets and allow more stages to run in parallel #113327
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #113329
    area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113264
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add API compat instructions to libraries building README #113088
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113263
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Remove experimental args from NodeJS WBT runner #113008
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • OSDescription: Returns a user-friendly name instead of kernel info on Android & Apple platforms #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-android, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Fix LdapConnection with AuthType.External #113238
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #111666
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.15
  • JIT: Introduce `LclVarDsc::lvIsMultiRegDest` #113294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Replace load local address with load global #113125
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] PerfScore #113011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113206
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113205
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [10.0/preview2] JIT: make array stack disable work in release builds #113305
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Initialize COM before initializing FLS slot. #113194
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing #113356
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasmDiffable #113161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • TP diff check #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • new perf-build pipeline added #113221
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.x
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `UseSizeOptimizedLinq` by default on native AOT #113214
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add ThisptrRetbufPrecode to set of precodes handled by StubPrecode path #112548
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Testing] Disable spin waiting when cpu quota limit is enabled #113184
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Haiku: Initial runtime support #112323
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113271
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Fix for issue 109410 #113140
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Refactor geometric type converters for improved parsing #111349
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging][wasm] remove problematic default settings #112216
    area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113261
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • Modernize `CookieContainer` domain-matching #112604
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Switch generic instance cache back to GHashTable; improve ginst hash function #113287
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Switch simdhash to prime bucket counts; increase load factor #113274
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [BLOCKED] System.CommandLine update #111864
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Console, blocked
  • JIT: Improve wrapper method inliner heuristic #113266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Boost inlining for more derived returns #113256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
